name: Gourmet Beef Burger
description: Hand-pressed Angus beef patty, melted cheddar, caramelized onions, and house sauce on a brioche bun.

name: Pan-Seared Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet served with asparagus, quinoa, and a zesty lemon-butter sauce.

name: Classic Ribeye Steak
description: 12oz Ribeye steak grilled to perfection, accompanied by roasted garlic mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

name: Creamy Truffle Pasta
description: Fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich truffle cream sauce with wild mushrooms and parmesan shavings.

name: Grilled Chicken Supreme
description: Tender chicken breast served with herb-roasted potatoes and a creamy mushroom thyme sauce.

name: Vegetarian Buddha Bowl
description: A healthy mix of quinoa, avocado, chickpeas, roasted sweet potatoes, and tahini dressing.

name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description: Fresh greens with grilled chicken, tomatoes, and house dressing.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Triple-layer sandwich with bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Fresh pasta with seasonal vegetables in light cream sauce.

name: Caesar Wrap
description: Crispy chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan in tortilla wrap.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Grilled fish with cabbage slaw and spicy mayo in corn tortillas.

name: Quinoa Bowl
description: Nutritious quinoa with roasted vegetables and tahini dressing.

name: Grilled Steak
description: Premium beef steak with roasted vegetables and mashed potatoes.

name: Salmon Fillet
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon with lemon butter sauce and rice.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Breaded chicken breast with marinara sauce and pasta.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Herb-crusted lamb chops with mint sauce and vegetables.

name: Seafood Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with mixed seafood and saffron.

name: Duck Confit
description: Slow-cooked duck leg with cherry sauce and roasted potatoes.

name: Cappuccino
description: Rich espresso with steamed milk foam and cocoa powder.

name: Fresh Lemonade
description: Freshly squeezed lemons with mint and sparkling water.

name: Iced Tea
description: Refreshing iced tea with lemon slices and fresh herbs.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich hot chocolate with whipped cream and marshmallows.

name: Espresso Macchiato
description: Strong espresso shot with a dollop of steamed milk foam.

name: Fruit Smoothie
description: Blend of fresh seasonal fruits with yogurt and honey.
